components.name: microagents-arrow
components.title: Microagents Arrow
components.description: Directional affordance for hopping between microagents.

components.name: microagents-link
components.title: Microagents Link
components.description: Action link for routing to a linked microagent.

components.name: microagents-send
components.title: Microagents Send
components.description: Prompt input for dispatching work to agents.

components.name: microagents-orchestration-left
components.title: Microagents Orchestration Left
components.description: Chevron control for stepping back in orchestration flows.

components.name: microagents-orchestration-right
components.title: Microagents Orchestration Right
components.description: Chevron control for stepping forward in orchestration flows.

components.name: microagents-agent-curve
components.title: Microagents Agent Curve
components.description: Decorative curve for representing agent-to-agent runs.

components.name: microagents-user-curve
components.title: Microagents User Curve
components.description: Decorative curve for representing user to agent hand-offs.

components.name: microagents-button
components.title: Microagents Button
components.description: Primary microagents call-to-action with gradient treatment.

components.name: microagents-button-alt
components.title: Microagents Button Alt
components.description: Secondary microagents action for softer confirmation steps.

components.name: microagents-panel
components.title: Microagents Panel
components.description: Composite panel bundling orchestration controls, link cards, and prompt send.
